attributes.action: Allow for the lawful culling of Seagulls.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British towns are a haven for seagulls.

Heaven help anyone whom walks in the vacinity of "baby" gulls whom are learning to fly - their parents invariably dive bomb people / animals whom they perceive as being a threat.

Our PM should allow for the humane culling of seagulls.
